ModMetaData.name: Roof Overlay Options
ModMetaData.author: nercury
ModMetaData.description:
Easily differentiate between constructed and natural roof in the roof overlay. Clearly see where the overhead mountain tiles are.
Settings: - Yellow constructed roof in roof overlay (default true). Use yelow-ish color for constructed (not-natural) roof in roof overlay, so it's different. - Red overhead mountain in roof overlay (default true). Use red color instead of dark green for thick roof (overhead mountain) in roof overlay.
